title: Organizational Change Leadership Development in Crisis Situations

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Combining Digital Device Workshops with Online Discussion Forums to Strengthen Reflective Learning Based on Real-World Cases

learning_goals: Learners can analyze the five core competencies of leaders who drive organizational change in crisis situations
Participants can evaluate their organization’s change management cases and propose improvements using reflective management research methodologies
Learners can elaborate collaborative problem-solving strategies with peers based on knowledge acquired from the colloquium model
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
